#summary Non-video tutorials and other long form articles about HeeksCAD

= Introduction =

The following resources may be useful, especially to new users of HeeksCAD and HeeksCNC.  This is not official documentations so features and user interface may have changed significantly. 


== Digital Machinist Article ==
[http://sliptonic.com/?p=491 
No Secrets:  Open-source CAM Application Bares All ]  A good general introduction to HeeksCAD and HeeksCNC with examples.
